title: auto driving mode, does 4a have it?
content:
I am soon in the market for a new phone. The most important feature of my current phone (Moto Z Play) is that it auto detects when I'm driving based on movement, and goes 'hands free' (reads texts, allows me to voice-dictate my text response) - I don't even have to take the phone out of my pocket.

I don't have bluetooth in my car, so cannot have it detect car via bluetooth connection. I've read that some Pixel's can have driving mode automatically engage without bluetooth (motion/speed detection?). Which models currently support this feature? 

And more importantly; does the Pixel 4a support this? That's the phone I'm looking at buying ;)

Thanks!
